Name: Arkady Survive
About the game: Arkady Survive is a symbiosis of Survival Sim and Match-Three , the action of which takes place in the apartment of a young men with social phobia - Arkady, who has decided to completely abstract from the outside world and switch to using a smart home. For a long time, he was able to successfully avoid contact with the outside world, until one fine day all the devices began to fail and Arkady's calm, measured life was not endangered. All this is complicated by the fact that new laws have started to be passed every day in the country, which complicate Arkadyâ€™s already not easy life. In this game you have to: Satisfy needs of Arkady and earn money - use smart devices! Repair smart device - play the exciting game Match-Three! Upgrade smart device - even more interesting levels in Match-Three! Put up with new laws - pay more money for your needs! And all this to achieve the main goal - survive ! How long can Arkady live in such a situation, without departing from his principles? Game features: Cheerful Arkady! 6 smart devices responsible for survival! Fascinating Survival Sim! Interesting Match-Three! Over 20 different levels! Game statistics! Achievements!
